Articles.Content:
With 2015 in just a couple of days, and 0.90 in our games, what are your New Years resolutions for KSP in 2015?

I'll kick off with mine: stop overEngineering my lower stage in RSS, then having a small payload fraction up top.

Share. NOW!!!
Finish the tech tree for once. AND, go to every planet at least once. I've never done those things... Ever.
Go complete the Kolonation (constellation) LKO>Mun>Minmus>Duna programme, so i can do the Jolanus Jool-5 programme, and then the Project INTEGRITY Jool survey/colonization mission.

I promise to (F5) stop abusing the (F5) quicksave featur and to- Ah, dangit, I misspelled feature.

(F9)

...abusing the quicksave feature in everything that I do. (F5) Aww, who am I kidding?

Edited December 20, 2014 by Xacktar

...(F9)

...abusing the quicksave feature in everything that I do. (F9) Aww, who am I kidding?

Thanks - I laughed :-)

My resolution - write a manual for beginners
Go to jool and land on it's moons. Maybe even for Jool-5.

1024x768, despite having a 1920x1200 monitor. Same as it's been for a few years now.

More seriously, try to get some serious progression with a campaign mode. Though that might end up with me restarting in science?

Happy holidays all,

Interesting thread....hmmm.... I like the idea of visiting every celestial body as soon as you can following 1 Jan.
Doing space related things. I'm getting a new machine soon, so something big! Space stations seem fun, so I might build a station and infrastructure around Kerbin.
Finally repeating my failed Jool Grand Tour mission in .90 career mode.
Make sure that the CSS mod dosen't die!

In 2015 I resolve to successfully complete a Jool-5 mission. Previous attempts were failures due to varying combinations of delta-V underestimation, poor piloting, docking bugs, and lagtastic part counts.
Go visit Dres and Moho sometime. They seem lonely.

I will not spend over a fiftieth of the year playing KSP.

No, I will hit a 26th!!!
